content: The #[automatically_derived] attribute can be applied to impls and suppresses unused variable lints. Apparently it was stabilized in 1.27.0, but I can find no mention of it in the changelog. Did this get stabilized by accident?
@Jonas Schievink I believe automatically_derived has been around before 1.0. There is some history noted in https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/issues/532
Do you see something specific in 1.27 that changed it? I was under the impression it was always stable.
Before that version is is linted as unused
